Author: mal31_
Text: Commit to building a better life for yourself and understand you fkn deserve it

Author: SubBiscuit
Text: You can start therapy and the recovery process without weight gain. As long as you are at least 80% above your ideal weight (medical term) then they likely won't force gaining. Once you're over 18 they cant force any treatment, just recommend it.  Eventually you might gain but if that's stopping you from getting help just make your fears known to your care team.  Getting help this young is amazing and you are so brave for even saying you need help. We're here to support you.
